name: Escape the Museum (itch)
description:
Gameplay:

The Player gets trapped in a haunted museum and has to find his way out. The player will progress through uniquely designed floors. Each floor has its own puzzles and brings the player closer to the escape. The puzzles are centred on the theme of history, urbanism, engineering, science and physics. Every floor is a new level which focuses on a different aspect. In order to escape the museum, the player has to solve all the puzzles.
